name: (Un)DETECTED [Level 1]
description:
The year is 2479.... 

A ruined world lay before your eyes                     
Dictation, tyranny, oppression, dystopia                                                
 And nearly everything is illegal

Now...

Flies infest the city....                                      Robots patrol 24/7....                                           The tortoise is always listening....

But it all ends today!

-----------------------

Play as XANE, a member of the Anti-Dystopians Obliterate (Mr)Bad(Guy) Organization (or A.D.O.B.O for short) as he's dropped off into the tent littered faction of Sector 403. Guided by your female informant, PARROT, you must navigate through tight alleyways, swat chunky flies, get weapons from various Arms Dealers, fight robots, all this while trying to remain as undetected as possible from all of Mr. Bad Guy's shelled spies that wander the city. 

FEATURES:

  • Fully voice acted dialogue!
  • Keycards and exits
  • Male protagonist!
  • Plenty of cool hand drawn weapons!
  • NPC interaction to learn how much this world sucks
  • Missions!
  • 4 super awesome levels including 1 big boss battle!
  • A banging original MIDI soundtrack by Dewdled!
  • Indestructible tortoises

An epic collab between:                                         Triangle Box Studio & Tofu Sheets Visual!

But we only have level 1, so what does it feature?

DEMO FEATURES:

  • 1 super awesome level
  • 2 of the 5 banging MIDI tracks by Dewdled
  • And everything else listed in features!

SPECIAL NOTES:

  • Wait for dialogue to end BEFORE interacting with another NPC to avoid overlapping
  • The Arms Dealer has different dialogue when you interact with him, so after the automatic meeting dialogue ends, go up to him and press E like all other NPCs
  • There is a door underneath the shelf in the Arms Dealer building 
  • Next level is just a blue box, so simply press Esc > Quit when you get there to end the game

CONTROLS:

Left-ClickFireSpaceJumpCCrouchEInteract/TalkEscMenu/Save

Created for So Bad, It's Good! Jam 2022.

(un)DETECTED is a DOOM TC using Freedoom as the IWAD = a free project with 100% original assets which allows redistribution. This allows original games made on the Doom Engine to be played without any doom wads. Both a standalone version packaged with LZDoom as well as a WAD ONLY version (in case you run into trouble with the standalone edition or use Mac) are provided. ^^
